summary:
Accounting professional with demonstrated expertise in manufacturing systems, cost accounting and general accounting. Excellent communicator, fluent in English and Greek. Excellent computer skills in Singular (Eurofasma, ESSO-EXO, Singdemo), Defacto, J.D. Edwards (E. R. P.), Singular-Logic DIS (E.R.P.), AS 400, Altec-Atlantis II (E.R.P.).
Additional areas of expertise includes: Inventory Management, ERP systems, Standard Cost Analysis.
